artist: Artist: Marguerite Van Cook , et al.; Author: Eric Drooker , et al.; Editor: Seth Tobocman , et al.; Publisher: World War 3 llustrated, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, photomechanical illustration of three children playing in the hand of a large, mechanical monster with horns, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 161 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War 3 Illustrated #12
